title: Make the selected floating action button use a blue color scheme

requirements.summary: Change only the specific targeted button to a blue background with accessible hover/focus/disabled states while preserving size/content/behavior and leaving all other buttons untouched.
acceptanceCriteria: The selected button renders with a clearly blue color scheme in its normal state.
Hover and focus-visible states remain accessible (visible focus ring, sufficient contrast).
Disabled state remains visually distinct and consistent with the blue styling.
No other buttons or global theme colors are changed; only the selected buttonâ€™s styling is affected.
The app compiles and runs without UI regressions.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the floating add Button (the one rendered at the bottom of JobsDashboardPage, matching the requested XPath target) by adding blue-specific Tailwind utility classes to its existing className: set a blue background and text color, plus blue hover, focus-visible ring (with ring offset), and disabled styles; keep existing sizing/positioning classes (fixed/bottom/right/rounded/shadow/h-14/w-14/p-0), icon/text, and onClick behavior unchanged. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
